title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Jan. 7, 1895. A New Polish Building and Loan Association Organized

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Jan. 7, 1895. A NEW POLISH BUILDING AND LOAN ASSOCIATION ORGANIZED

body.p: A new Polish organization, the Bartosz Glowacki Building Loan and Savings Society, located at 844 West 17th Street, was recently organized. Its officers are as follows:

F. Galoszewski, president; J. Wierzchowski, vice-president; O. Grochowski, first secretary; P. Jezierny, second secretary; J. Balcer, third secretary; S. F. Malicki, cashier; and S. F. Adalia Satalecki, attorney.
The directors are: S. F. Adalia Satalecki, O. Grochowski, M. Kucik, J. Wierzchowski, F. Golaszewski, S. F. Malicki, P. Jezierny, S. Budzbanowski, and J. Januszewski.
The following make up the Financial Committee: Joseph Tomas, J. Januszewski, M. Kucik, and W. Kuszewski.
S. Budzbanowski, J. Januszewski and Bernard Palt are on the Appraising Committee.
Meetings are held every Saturday at 8 P. M. at M. Porozynski's Hall, 844 West 17th Street.
All persons desiring information or wishing to become members of this Society are invited to attend any of the meetings.
